messages.title: What This Election is About
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn. Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Delivering a Brexit that Works For Us
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will be able to say goodbye to European courts and welcome back control over our laws, money, borders, and trade. Theresa May needs your vote to strengthen her hand in the forthcoming Brexit negotiations.
Committed to ensuring our area gets the healthcare services it needs and to get recognition for Tameside General's progress.

issues.brexitEurope: We need a General Election now to secure the leadership the country needs to see us through Brexit and beyond. Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.
issues.health: Supporting Our Local NHS. Having been actively involved in the new out-of-hours NHS GP hub in Ashton, I'm keen to ensure it remains open and serves the people.

community.content: Growing up in Ashton, I understand the importance of community facilities. My main priority is to support and invest in local community programs to improve the quality of life for all residents.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ashton born and bred - born here, grew up here, went to school here. My priority will always be the people of Ashton, Droylsden and Failsworth.

quotes.text: Growing up in Ashton, I understand the importance of community facilities. My main priority is to support and invest in local community programs to improve the quality of life for all residents.

images.caption: Walking the dog with my Mum in Daisy Nook.
